revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WDR3600 |revision=v1.x |series=N600 |upc=845973070007 |asin=B008RV51EE |fcc_date=10/16/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WDR3600 |ic_id=8853A-WDR3600 |pcb_id=2050500231 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=3.4 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344;Atheros, AR9344-BC2A, PBT220.000, 1311, CHINA; |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL064KIF |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR Y5C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344;Atheros, AR9344-BC2A, PBT220.000, 1311, CHINA; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9582;AR9582-AR1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, Gargoyle, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=2268&model=TL-WDR3600 Product page] {{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/TL-WDR3600/Index.htm Firmware Interface] {{•}} [http://www.tplink.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WDR3600&version=V1 Downloads]
"2050500231 Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This would seem to indicate that this device shares the same board :with some models of the [[TP-LINK TL-WDR4300]].
"2050500272 Rev:1.3" would appear to be silkscreened on [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=45607 WDR3600] :(v1.4/v1.5 boards) and perhaps some/all v1.2 boards (??). RAM and Flash may vary: 2x W9751G6KB-25 and W25Q64FVSIG is used on some units.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos for the <small>('''US''' sold, obv.)</small> device is a :'''HuntKey''' HKA01812015-2K (100-240VAC ~50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.5A) The coaxial power connector on the device would appear to be an '''EIAJ-04'''.
==Additional external links== ===Firmware project forum posts / wiki pages=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=710430 On the '''DD-WRT Forums'''] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wdr3600 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :The v1.1 unit shown has "2050500231 Rev:1.0" silkscreened on the board.
===Vendors=== *[http://www.amazon.co.uk/TP-Link-TL-WDR3600-Wireless-Gigabit-Storage/dp/B008QBAXI4 On '''Amazon.co.uk'''] :ASIN: B008QBAXI4
